actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend part D of title IV of the Social Security Act to give consent, on behalf of the United States, to certain additional garnishment proceedings.

summary.text: Amends part D (Child Support and Establishment of Paternity) of title IV of the Social Security Act to subject to garnishment as alimony under such part any payment or transfer of property or its value between spouses or former spouses in compliance with a community property settlement, equitable division of property, or other division of property directed by a court of competent jurisdiction.

titles.title: A bill to amend part D of title IV of the Social Security Act to give consent, on behalf of the United States, to certain additional garnishment proceedings.
